tool_description:
Validates and verifies an email address assessing deliverability and quality. 

There are plenty of significant reasons behind having proper validation in place:
1. Sending emails to fake/no-longer-existent addresses will hurt your deliverability.
2. Mistyping an email address will block users from confirming their account or resetting a password.
3. Valid e-mail addresses, lets you stay in touch with users.
4. Improves ROI of your email marketing campaign
5. Helps in maintaining domain reput...
name: Email Validation and Verification- End to End checks
title: Email Validation and Verification- End to End checks
tool_name: Email Validation and Verification- End to End checks

api_list.name: Email as part of URL
api_list.description: Validates and verifies an email address measuring deliverability and quality
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validation-and-verification-end-to-end-checks.p.rapidapi.com/jane.doe@example.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-validation-and-verification-end-to-end-checks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validation-and-verification-end-to-end-checks.p.rapidapi.com/{email}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-validation-and-verification-end-to-end-checks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
